attributes.action: STOP ENERGY PRICES RISING AND CAUSING UNNECESSARY DEATH THIS WINTER!!!!
attributes.additional_details: Because no person in the UK believes the government an what they do your hated on for everything you've done the past few years. If you can help people from freezing to death in their own homes and actually help the people of Britain out then maybe we will have faith in the system again
attributes.background: I want you to stop these energy companies who are making billions in profit to cut the prices as this winter the UK will lose so many people due to the cold in their own homes. Someone needs to do something

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for energy providers.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623277
